description:
Shortly after releasing the first TV spot, FX has revealed the second teaser for American Horror Story: Coven.FX电视台前几天刚放出《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》（《美国恐怖故事》第三季）首支预告片之后，现在又放出了第二支预告片。

The 22-second clip is titled Pins and Needles, and is as brief, eerieas the first. The trailer sticks to the show’s tradition of not featuring the series’ stars in the promotional snippets. 这支22妙长的预告片名字叫做《Pins and Needles》，和第一支预告片一样，这支预告片也非常简单、诡异。这支预告片继续了之前不突出主角的传统。

The third American Horror Story cycle will be all about witches, featuring a clash between salem witches and voodoo practitioners. New stars to join Coven include Emma Roberts, Kathy Bates, Gabourey Sidibe, and Angela Bassett, beside regulars like Jessica Lange, Denis O’Hare, Alexandra Breckenridge, and Evan Peters.《美国恐怖故事》第三季将会讲述巫师的故事，故事围绕赛伦女巫和伏都教徒之间的争斗展开。加入该剧第三季的新演员有Emma Roberts、Kathy Bates、Gabourey Sidibe和Angela Bassett，另外在前几季出现过的Jessica Lange、Danis O'Hare、Alexandra Breckenridge和Evan Peters都会在第三季出现。

American Horror Story: Coven is scheduled to return Oct. 9.《美国恐怖故事：巫师集会》将会在10月9日首播。
